ensemble-mean-ch4-wetlands-emissions.title: (Daily) Wetland Methane Emissions, Ensemble Mean LPJ-EOSIM Model v2
ensemble-mean-ch4-wetlands-emissions.description: Methane emissions from wetlands in units of grams of methane per meter squared per day. Ensemble of multiple climate forcing data sources input to LPJ-EOSIM model.

era5-ch4-wetlands-emissions.title: (Daily) Wetland Methane Emissions, ERA5 LPJ-EOSIM Model v2
era5-ch4-wetlands-emissions.description: Methane emissions from wetlands in units of grams of methane per meter squared per day. ECMWF Re-Analysis (ERA5) as input to LPJ-EOSIM model.

merra2-ch4-wetlands-emissions.title: (Daily) Wetland Methane Emissions, MERRA-2 LPJ-EOSIM Model v2
merra2-ch4-wetlands-emissions.description: Methane emissions from wetlands in units of grams of methane per meter squared per day. Modern-Era Retrospective analysis for Research and Applications Version 2 (MERRA-2) data as input to LPJ-EOSIM model.
